name: Grill Beef Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Grill Beef Recipe: Beef undercut 1 kg Potato boiled 1 Capsicum 1 Onion 2 Cauliflower blanched half Water 1 cup Soya sauce ¼ cup Oil ¼ cup Sesame seeds roasted 1 tsp Mustard paste 1 tbsp Crushed black pepper 1 tbsp Worchester sauce 2 tbsp Ginger garlic paste 2 tbsp Black pepper powder ½ tsp Salt to taste
instructions: In a pan add oil, ginger garlic, beef and cook till water dries out completely Add soy sauce, Wooster sauce, mustard paste, crushed black pepper, salt and mix for 2 mins Add water, cover and let it cook Cut the vegetables in cubes and fry the vegetables Add white sesame seeds black pepper salt and sautÃ© for a while When all the vegetables tenders keep aside Remove the lid of the beef pan and mix well Remove the beef anmd grill it Add the sauce with it and cook til it gets a nice color Remove on a chopping board and slice it Put the remaining sauce on it and serve with sautÃ©ed vegetables
